nars.term
Class ImageInt

java.lang.Object
  nars.term.Term
      nars.term.CompoundTerm
          nars.term.ImageInt
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Term>
public class ImageInt
extends CompoundTerm

An intension image.

(\,P,A,_)) --> B iff P --> (*,A,B)

Internally, it is actually (\,A,P)_1, with an index.
